abstract: New York Rangers defeat HC Slovan Bratislava, 4-1, to earn their third straight preseason victory in Europe.
snippet: Mats Zuccarrelo started a stretch of four goals and the Rangers rallied for a 4-1 victory over Slovan Bratislava on Sunday in Slovakia for their third straight preseason win in Europe.
lead_paragraph: Mats Zuccarrelo started a stretch of four goals and the Rangers rallied for a 4-1 victory over Slovan Bratislava on Sunday in Slovakia for their third straight preseason win in Europe.
